sources.title: Le Petit Poucet
sources.description: The story of Tom Thumb, re-released in the US as a split reel along with the documentary The Hermit Crab in 1922. Country: France Language: French Release Date: 10 September 1909 (USA) Director: Segundo de Chomón Writers: Segundo de Chomón (writer) Charles Perrault (writer) Distributors Pathé Frères (1909) (France) (theatrical) Pathé Frères (1909) (USA) (theatrical) General Film Company (1912) (USA) (theatrical) (re-release)
